nodes.body: @eric-wieser It is possible to put `↿f` as the body of `uncurry₃`, and I'll change that if needed, but it's not possible to change the type signature of ` uncurry_3_eq_uncurry₃` to `uncurry f = (↿ f) ∘ (finThreeArrowEquiv α)`; lean throws the error `failed to synthesize instance HasUncurry (OfArity α β 3) ?m.12793 ?m.12795`. Since my intent with `uncurry₃` is to provide specifications for cases where the types may be pretty complex (like these heterogeneous functions or the ternary functor uncurrying from the other PR) it needs to have a concrete type for unification
This PR was included in a batch that was canceled, it will be automatically retried

Thanks :tada:

bors merge

Thanks :tada:

bors merge

I think this should perhaps be called `OfTypeTuple` or something? `OfArity` is so named because `OfArity A B 3` is a function of arity `3`. This declaration reads as `OfHArity ![B, C] D`, which doesn't actually mention the arity at all.

I guess I what I had in mind is that `![B, C]` is the arity of the function, eg in the sense that a multi-sorted theory has function symbols whose arities look like `![A1,...,An] -> B`. But that interpretation is pretty unclear from just the code/docs, and not that standard to begin with. The name `OfTypeTuple` also feels unclear to me, what about `FromTypes ![B, C] D`?
`FromTypes` sounds fine too. Maybe ask on Zulip for a name suggestion?
I think these should be reviewed as a separate PR.
Sorry, I misunderstood what you were suggesting I take out from the previous PR. I'll strip the 3-currying stuff
I wonder if we can get away with making this an `abbrev`; does anything break?
Seems like it's fine, the ZFC.Basic file doesn't break in any new way

This should be `two` not `2` in the theorem name

bors r-

bors d+

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat(Logic/Function/FromTypes): Add curried heterogeneous function types

nodes.body: @eric-wieser It is possible to put `↿f` as the body of `uncurry₃`, and I'll change that if needed, but it's not possible to change the type signature of ` uncurry_3_eq_uncurry₃` to `uncurry f = (↿ f) ∘ (finThreeArrowEquiv α)`; lean throws the error `failed to synthesize instance HasUncurry (OfArity α β 3) ?m.12793 ?m.12795`. Since my intent with `uncurry₃` is to provide specifications for cases where the types may be pretty complex (like these heterogeneous functions or the ternary functor uncurrying from the other PR) it needs to have a concrete type for unification

Thanks :tada:
